title: The Bachelorette: Timm Hanly's bizarre hairstyle inspires Twitter memes
text:
Amid the tears and tantrums in The Bachelorette mansion, fans only had one question on their minds on Wednesday: 'What the hell is happening with Timm Hanly's hair?'

The 27-year-old fireproofer arrived at the cocktail party with his signature long hair straightened and styled in a high bun.

Timm certainly stood out from the crowd, with viewers flocking to Twitter to mock his unique look and share hilarious memes.

Bizarre! Amid the tears and tantrums in The Bachelorette mansion, fans only had one question on their minds on Wednesday: 'What the hell is happening with Timm Hanly's hair?'

'Tim looks like a bogan Captain Jack Sparrow tonight and for some reason I don't hate it,' one person tweeted.

Another fan shared a side-by-side comparison of their dog and Timm, which they captioned: 'These spot the difference games are getting harder and harder.'

A third viewer compared Timm's appearance to that of Australian comedian Tim Minchin, who rocks a similar hairstyle.

Spot the difference! The 27-year-old fireproofer arrived at the cocktail party with his long hair straightened and styled in a high bun, which one viewer compared to their dog on Twitter

Do you see the resemblance? 'Tim looks like a bogan Captain Jack Sparrow tonight and for some reason I don’t hate it,' one fan tweeted

Compare the pair! Another viewer compared Timm's appearance to that of Australian comedian Tim Minchin, who rocks a similar hairstyle

Despite the jokes, some Bachelorette fans said they genuinely liked Timm's hair.

'Timm is the best man ever made on this earth, he says f**k them gender roles! I'm gonna straighten my hair, put on makeup, confront my fellow men when they're being d**kheads,' one viewer wrote on Twitter.

'Tim has better hair than me,' a female fan tweeted, while another asked: 'What brand of hair straightener is Timm using?'

'He has better hair than me!' Despite the jokes, some Bachelorette fans said they genuinely liked Timm's hair

Ouch! Of course, there were plenty of viewers demanding Timm get a haircut immediately

Of course, there were plenty of viewers demanding Timm get a haircut immediately.

'Which a**hole told Timm that he should straighten his hair?' one person wrote.

Timm is believed to go far in The Bachelorette, but Daily Mail Australia understands he does not win Angie Kent's heart.

The Bachelorette continues Thursday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: Amid the tears and tantrums in The Bachelorette mansion, fans only had one question on their minds on Wednesday: 'What the hell is happening with Timm Hanly's hair?'
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
